nodes.bodyText: no validation, please take a look at deviceValidator in DeviceServiceImpl (for example).

Please use similar logging patter as we usually do:
log.trace("Executing findAll, tenantId [{}]", tenantId);

commit.message: feature - add more find methods for entity profile service and some fixes

nodes.bodyText: Let's also check that sameName but different entityTypes works fine
